allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
ProspectX Intelligence — full platform snapshot \(Feb 13, 2026\)

Complete hockey scouting report platform with:
- Next.js 16 frontend \(10 routes, ProspectX branding, Tailwind CSS 4\)
- FastAPI backend with SQLite, JWT auth, Claude AI report generation
- 19 report templates with descriptions, Player vs Team categorization
- InStat Excel format auto-detection for stats import
- Prospect grading scale \(A through NR\) with grade badge in report header
- PDF download with player-named filenames
- Batch player import with fuzzy duplicate detection
- Scout notes CRUD with tags and privacy
- 28 Chatham Maroons GOJHL players imported
- Print-friendly CSS for clean report exports

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Hockey Operating System foundations — team systems, glossary, archetypes

- Add 6 new Hockey OS database tables \(hockey_terms, systems_library, team_systems, player_archetypes, system_adherence, team_eval_criteria\)
- Seed 19 systems library entries \(forecheck, DZ, OZ, breakout, PK\) and 15 glossary terms
- Add Hockey OS API endpoints \(systems-library, glossary, team-systems CRUD\)
- Create Systems Management UI page with library browser, team system forms, and identity tags
- Enhance Player Detail page with Profile tab: archetype editor, ProspectX Indices, team system context
- Add Systems link to NavBar
- Update report generation prompt with Hockey OS terminology and SYSTEM_FIT section
- Pass team system data to AI report generation when player''s team has a system profile

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Restructure Systems page to match wireframe + add Team Style fields

- Redesign Systems page with navy gradient header, sectioned form layout
- Add Team Style section: Pace, Physicality, Offensive Style dropdowns
- Add Power Play as explicit system dropdown in form
- Show system description hints below dropdowns when selected
- Add pace/physicality/offensive_style columns to team_systems DB table
- Include Team Style in AI report generation prompt context
- Display Team Style on Player Detail profile tab
- Update card expanded view with separate Systems and Team Style sections

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Migrate /systems route to /team-systems with simplified single-column layout

- New /team-systems page with stacked full-width dropdowns matching wireframe
- Delete old /systems page \(2-column grid layout\)
- Update NavBar link to /team-systems
- Update Player Detail page links to /team-systems

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(powershell -Command "Get-Process -Name python -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Stop-Process -Force; Get-Process -Name uvicorn -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Stop-Process -Force; Write-Output ''Done''")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add SYSTEM_FIT demo experience — the killer demo feature

Backend:
- Report generation now resolves system codes to full tactical descriptions
  \(e.g., FC_221 → "2-1-2 Forecheck — Two forwards go deep..."\)
- Include pace/physicality/offensive_style in team system context
- Enhanced SYSTEM_FIT prompt: requires forecheck role analysis, DZ/OZ evaluation,
  special teams fit, compatibility rating, and tactical coaching recommendations
- System fit rating scale: Elite Fit / Strong Fit / Developing Fit / Adjustment Needed

Frontend:
- ReportSection now renders SYSTEM_FIT with premium card treatment:
  Shield icon, Hockey OS badge, ice stripe, teal/navy gradient border
- Extracts and displays fit rating badge \(color-coded\)
- Executive Summary, Projection, and Bottom Line also get subtle highlight styling
- Report parser updated to handle ## markdown heading prefixes

Data:
- Chatham Maroons: 2-1-2 forecheck, High Tempo, Heavy Physical, Cycle & Grind
- Ewan McChesney: Two-Way Forward archetype assigned

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash(wmic process where "name=''python.exe'' or name=''python3.exe'' or name=''uvicorn.exe''" get ProcessId,CommandLine)
Bash(cmd /c "wmic process where ProcessId=17916 get Name,CommandLine")

Bash(League"\) in addition to abbreviations, so players with full league
names display correctly. Teams page dropdown deduplicates by
normalized abbreviation and card badges show short abbr only.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(powershell.exe -Command "Get-Process -Name node -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Stop-Process -Force; Start-Sleep -Seconds 2; Get-Process -Name node -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Select-Object Id, ProcessName")
